product_name: Advanced Elements Deck Conversion Kit - Double
long_description: The Advanced Elements Deck Conversion kit zips in to transform your AdvancedFrame Convertible kayak into a closed deck, 2-person touring kayak with spray skirt coamings. Deck is made from durable high-density polyester for lasting resistance to the elements; welded seams and durable PVC coating offer waterproof protection. Stiffening bars keep the deck rigid and prevent water from pooling. D-rings offer an easy place to tie down gear; mesh pocket provides easy access to small items. Heavy-duty coil zipper with metal slider provides easy installation while kayak is deflated. Inflatable coaming with 2 twist-open air valves creates a rigid attachment for a spray skirt (sold separately). The Advanced Elements Deck Conversion Kit folds down easily into included mesh storage bag with drawcord closure.
short_description: The Advanced Elements Deck Conversion kit zips in to transform your AdvancedFrame Convertible kayak into a closed deck, 2-person touring kayak with spray skirt coamings.
